Articles.Content:
So one of the more humorous (and possibly endearing) mods from KSP1 was the mod where someone had art swapped the models for everything with cardboard boxes, plywood, and basically made the rockets look like a bunch of kids had let their imaginations run wild in the backyard with the interstellar vehicles.

It'd be kinda awesome if this mod made its way back into KSP2, either officially or unofficially - but once we're through the backlog of bugs from the KSP2 launch that is.
